ComicInfo.Summary:
Viking spirits war over Raphael's body! Will Ray be able to figure out a solution before Raph goes berserk?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dan Schoening & Luis Antonio Delgado | 1 | B | Cover B | Mark Torres | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ben Bishop | 3 |
